titleStmt.title: An extraordinary collection of original pictures will be sold by auction, at the Three-Tun Tavern in Witch-street, behind St. Clement's Church; on Monday the ninth of this instant November, 1691. and the two following days The sale will begin at three each afternoon. The pictures are ready to be view'd, and the catalogues to be delivered to all gentlemen, &c. please to repair to the place of sale.

An extraordinary collection of original pictures will be sold by auction, at the Three-Tun Tavern in Witch-street, behind St. Clement's Church; on Monday the ninth of this instant November, 1691. and the two following days The sale will begin at three each afternoon. The pictures are ready to be view'd, and the catalogues to be delivered to all gentlemen, &c. please to repair to the place of sale.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
